Files:
  - "TVA_14C.csv"
  - "WB_14C.csv"
Source: journal article "Initial characterization of processes of soil carbon stabilization using forest stand-level radiocarbon enrichment"
Curator: J. Beem-Miller
Date received: 01-Apr-2020
Contents:
  - TVA_14C.csv contains tabular data from figure 3 (14C of density fractions and bulk soil from the TVA site)
  - WB_14C.csv contains tabular data from figure 2 (14C of density fractions and bulk soil from the WB site)
Notes:
  - data grabbed from figures using Web Plot Digitizer <https://apps.automeris.io/wpd/>
References:
  - Swanston et al. 2005 <https://doi.org/10.1016/j.geoderma.2004.12.015>
  - Web Plot Digitizer <https://apps.automeris.io/wpd/>
